attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst there is a RIGHT TO BUY and young people are encoyraged to go dow this path,there are young people who do not want to go that way,Therefore,they shoudl have the RIGHT TO RENT with the government providing equal numbers of properties
TO RENT.this give choice and an even playing field in property field.The rents would have to be affordable.It also assists young people having to lose their purchased homes and to enter an affordable rent.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
